creator: gclopp@rapporttechnologies.com
text:
I am a developer of ISAPI EXTENSION(s) for IIS. Apache 1_3 WriteClient works 
fine, however, 2.0.45 is not working at all. My extension works fine in IIS - 
gone through 5 months of QA. Please contact me for specifics. Moreover, after 2 
WriteClient calls - gpf in libapr.dll

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
Please attach further information, the detailed errors you experience, etc,
  and reopen the bug if you can provide us sufficient information to help us
  identify the problem you are experiencing.  Note that only a minimal subset
  of ISAPI is actually "INDUSTRY STANDARD" - the rest are IIS extentions to
  that API.

  If WriteClient simply returns, you might be attempting to use the async
  features; use the ISAPIFakeAsync directive to ask your server to trick
  ISAPI extensions into believing their requests were handled in async mode.
